CHA: 现在没有广告，请稍后再试。
EN: Now no ads, Please try again later.

CHA: 点击任意物体，将它敲碎！
点击任意位置，消除一行！
EN: Tap any item to remove everything in that row!

CHA: 点击任意位置，消除一列！
EN: Tap any item to remove everything in that column!

CHA: 点击任意位置，重置所有的方块！
EN: Tap any cube to shuffle all of the cubes!
Do you really want to quit?
Start the level with a Rocket!
Start the level with a Bomb!
Start the level with a Color Magnet!

CHA: 看视频得免费转盘机会
EN: Watch a video to get a free spin

CHA: 稍后再来进行另一次转盘！
EN: Come back later for another spin!
Come back tomorrow for another spin!

CHA: 开始关卡前可以得到初始道具，帮助您顺利通关！
EN: Pass levels without losing a life to start levels with boosters!

CHA: 收到今天的奖励！明天再给您一个更大的惊喜!
EN: Receive today's reward items! Come back tomorrow for your next  surprise!

CHA: 点击2个或以上相同颜色色块，收集它们！
EN: Tap 2 or more same colored cubes to collect them!

CHA: 收集剩余色块，直到目标完成！
EN: Collect the remaining cubes until the goal is complete!

CHA: 点击5个相同颜色色块可以生成火箭！
EN: Tap 5 cubes to create a ROCKET!

CHA: 太棒了!现在轻敲火箭看看它做了什么！
EN: Great! Now tap the ROCKET to see what it does!

CHA: 现在点击7个相同色块可以生成一个炸弹！
EN: Now tap 7 cubes to create a BOMB!

CHA: 太好了!轻击炸弹清除周围的色块！
EN: Excellent!Tap the BOMB to clear the cubes around!

CHA: 点击9个相同色块可以生成彩虹球！
EN: Tap 9 cubes to create a DISCO BALL!

CHA: 太神奇!点击彩虹球收集那些相同颜色的方块！
EN: Amazing!Tap the DISCO BALL to collect the cubes of that color!

CHA: 点击相连的道具来制造一个超级的爆炸！
EN: Tap connected items to make a powerful explosion!

CHA: 消除海星旁边的色块来收集它！
EN: Tap cubes next to a STARFISH to collect it!

CHA: 将一只企鹅移动到下面去收集它!
EN: Bring a PENGUIN to the bottom to collect it!
Tap to select the HAMMER Booster!
Tap the cube to remove it!

CHA: 收割机可以消灭一行色块！
EN: CROPPER removes everything in a row!

CHA: 铁锭可以消灭一列色块！
EN: ANVIL removes everythng in a column!

CHA: 三叶草可以重新排序所有色块！
你可以用这些强大的助推器开始关卡！
EN: You can start the level with these powerful boosters!

CHA: 点击冰封的色块收集冰块！
EN: Tap cubes in a ICE CUBE to collect it!

CHA: 敲击木箱旁边的方块，把它打破！
EN: Tap cubes next to a CRATE to break it!

CHA: 在海马旁边敲几块来收集小海马！
EN: Tap cubes next to a SEAHOUSE to collect DWARF SEAHOUSE!

CHA: 在彩色海星旁边消除相同颜色色块来收集它！
EN: Make a color match next to a COLORED STARFISH to collect it!

CHA: 在灯泡旁边消除两次色块来收集它！
EN: Make 2 matches next to a LIGHT BULB to collect it!

CHA: 在海藻扩散之前，点击海藻旁边的方块消除它！
EN: Tap cubes next to the ALGAE before it spreads!

CHA: 在有颜色的木箱旁边消除相同颜色色块来收集它！
EN: Make a color match next to a COLORED CRATE to collect it!

CHA: 北极兔只能被火箭或炸弹来收集它！
EN: POLAR HARE can only be cleared by Rocket or Bomb!

CHA: 消除罐头塔旁边的方块，把罐头敲倒！
EN: Tap cubes next to CANNING TOWER to knock CAN down!

CHA: 消除变色鱼周围色块给它上色，再用相同颜色色块收集它！
EN: Tap cubes to paint an DISCOLOURED FISH then make a color match!

CHA: 点击渔网旁边的方块，把里面的东西放出来！
EN: Tap cubes next to a FISHNET to release what's inside!

EN: No cube can be click,retry pelease!

CHA: 生成{0}个目标道具，即可获得金币奖励！
EN: Create {0} target items to get your reward!

CHA: 用火箭或炸弹击中集装箱3次以解救小熊！
EN: Hit CONTAINER 3 times with Rocket or Bomb to collect it!

CHA: 连续在猫箱四周消除两次色块可以收集它！
EN: Make 2 consecutive matches next to an CAT BOX to collect it!

CHA: 您将失去你的皇冠和成就!
取得一场胜利即可开始比赛，赢得惊喜奖励！
EN: Win a level to join Star Tournament and get amazing rewards!

CHA: 在书架旁边消除五种相同颜色色块来收集它！
EN: Make a color match next to a BOOKCASE to collect it!

CHA: 点击这里可以看到板子
EN: Tap Here To See The Board

CHA: 完成目标项目收集任务，获得惊喜奖励！
EN: Create target items to get your reward!

CHA: 每日转盘赢的免费道具！
EN: Spin to win boosters for free!
